Title: Mechanical Book of Kells Design Pocket Watch by Mullingar Pewter
Description: o Handmade Pocket Watch, beautiful exquisite vintage style Trinity Knot design. o Measures 1.75" in diameter with a 14 inch chain length. o Made in Ireland by Mullingar Pewter by a skilled crafts person. o Elegantly presented in a Gift Box, a perfect gift for that special occasion. o Item Code: MPEWT36-K. Mechanical Book of Kells Design Pocket Watch by Mullingar Pewter A beautiful vintage style hand-made pocket watch with Celtic Knot Motit design. This classic pocket watch is Quartz and measures 1 & 3/4" in diameter with a 14 inch pocket watch chain length. Pewter never dates and is a superb display piece. Handcrafted in Ireland by a skilled craftsperson Mullingar Pewter. Mullingar Pewter, based in County Westmeath, Ireland, has always applied the highest standards of design and craftsmanship to produce pewter gifts of the highest quality, continuing a tradition dating back some 800 years. Each piece is still made in the traditional way in a crafts workshop by Irish men and women, specially trained in the old casting methods, meticulous assembly and delicate hand finishing. These skills take years to acquire and each piece of pewter bears the company touch mark which is a guarantee in itself.
